Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Repository

This is a repository of The Kerbal Space containing addons, mods, parts and packs with parts.

We're also going to post some updates about what's going on in the Kerbal universe from time to time so stay tuned.

You also find download mirrors of the game there.

[mod]There is already a thread for the Kerbal Space Repository: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=524

Locking this thread[/mod]
